name: part_008
file: tmp_【3Dミニライブあり】アルバム大解剖SP【#ReGLOSSアルバム発売】 [JaOPEm5u1ko]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: The members discuss the recording process and difficulty of the song 'SUPER DUPER'.
Ichijou Ririka introduces a favorite part of 'SUPER DUPER' that multiple members agreed on.
A video snippet of 'SUPER DUPER' is played, with some members dancing along in the studio.
The group discusses the lyrics of 'SUPER DUPER' and how they fit each member's personality.
Ririka introduces the next song, 'LAKI MODE', and Hajime explains the concept and vocal style.
A performance snippet of 'LAKI MODE' is shown on the screen.
The members share their thoughts on 'LAKI MODE' and the difficulty of singing it.
Ririka shares a comment from the song's producer, Ohtora, regarding the members' singing abilities.

subtitles.original: 良かった
subtitles.english: Glad to hear that.

subtitles.original: えー
subtitles.english: Eh?

subtitles.original: えー！LAKI MODEも難しいけどな
subtitles.english: Eh! LAKI MODE is also difficult, though.

subtitles.original: うん、LAKI MODEもね
subtitles.english: Yeah, LAKI MODE too.

subtitles.original: うちめっちゃ大好きだから、ずっと言ってるもんね
subtitles.english: I really love it, I've been saying it for a long time.

subtitles.original: 歌ってたよね、歌枠で
subtitles.english: You sang it, right? In a singing stream.

subtitles.original:
Yeah yeah yeah, Woah woah woah... 
LAKI MODEもちゃんかちしたかったし
subtitles.english:
Yeah yeah yeah, Woah woah woah... 
I wanted to nail LAKI MODE too.

subtitles.original: 大好き、ここ
subtitles.english: I love this part.

subtitles.original: どう？自分が歌うってなって、歌枠で一回歌ってたじゃん
subtitles.english:
How was it? When you decided to sing it,
you sang it once in a singing stream.

subtitles.original: うん
subtitles.english: Yeah.

subtitles.original: 難しかった？
subtitles.english: Was it difficult?

subtitles.original: むっちゃ難しかった！めっちゃ練習すごいした
subtitles.english: It was really difficult! I practiced so much.

subtitles.original: 難しいよね
subtitles.english: It's difficult, isn't it?

subtitles.original: なんかね、ラップの部分みたいな早口のところもあるもんね
subtitles.english: Like, there are fast-paced parts like rap sections.

subtitles.original: ね、あるある
subtitles.english: Yeah, there are.

subtitles.original: そんなね、早口なところで、この3人がね
subtitles.english: In such fast-paced parts, these three...

subtitles.original:
ここのフレーズ、この歌詞好きって言ったところが、
なんと3人一致していたんですよね
subtitles.english:
...where they said they like this phrase or these lyrics,
surprisingly, all three of them agreed.

subtitles.original: なに？
subtitles.english: What is it?

subtitles.original: ぜひね、流そうかなと思います。リリカさん、お願いしていいですか？
subtitles.english: I'd like to play it. Ririka-san, could you please?

subtitles.original: はい
subtitles.english: Okay.

subtitles.original: なかななね、3人全部一緒になることないんだけど
subtitles.english: It's quite rare for all three to match.

subtitles.original: そうだね
subtitles.english: That's true.

subtitles.original: バチッとね
subtitles.english: Perfectly.

subtitles.original: 流しますよ
subtitles.english: I'll play it.

subtitles.original: お願いします
subtitles.english: Please do.

subtitles.original: 運命...
subtitles.english: Fate...

subtitles.original: おー、間違えた！
subtitles.english: Oh, I made a mistake!

subtitles.original: 奏の声が！すいません、間違えました。ぽち
subtitles.english: Kanade's voice! Sorry, I made a mistake. Click.

subtitles.original: 今のはBUDDY'Sですね
subtitles.english: That was BUDDY'S.

subtitles.original: あ、ここですね
subtitles.english: Ah, it's here.

subtitles.original: (SUPER DUPER Snippet)
subtitles.english: (SUPER DUPER Snippet)

subtitles.original: ちょっとお詫びのダンスで
subtitles.english: A dance to apologize...

subtitles.original: 何してるの？
subtitles.english: What are you doing?

subtitles.original: (SUPER DUPER Snippet)
subtitles.english: (SUPER DUPER Snippet)

subtitles.original: 曲が入ってこない。あ、そっか。踊らしてよ
subtitles.english: The song isn't getting through. Oh, right. Let me dance.

subtitles.original: 踊らしてあげてよ
subtitles.english: Let her dance.

subtitles.original: ここですね
subtitles.english: Here it is.

subtitles.original: ここ、はじめも大好きですよ
subtitles.english: Hajime also loves this part.

subtitles.original: おー！いっちゃん好き！
subtitles.english: Oh! I love it the most!

subtitles.original: うん、わかる。いっちゃん好き
subtitles.english: Yeah, I get it. I love it the most.

subtitles.original: 奏も好き。え、5人一致ってことですね
subtitles.english: Kanade likes it too. Oh, so all 5 agree.

subtitles.original: 5人一致でここのフレーズがいいと
subtitles.english: All 5 agree this phrase is good.

subtitles.original:
なんか、ちゃんとさ、それこそ、うちらの色が出てるというか。
MANGAとかGENIUSとかそういう...
subtitles.english:
Like, it really brings out our colors.
Like 'MANGA' or 'GENIUS'...

subtitles.original:
ちゃんとこう、僕たちの歌ってる人に合ってる歌詞って感じが、
それこそちゃんと見てくださってるんだなって感じが...
subtitles.english:
It feels like the lyrics match the person singing,
and it feels like they're really watching us...

subtitles.original: うん、わかる
subtitles.english: Yeah, I get it.

subtitles.original: めちゃめちゃ良かったですね
subtitles.english: It was really good.

subtitles.original: 大虎さんさ、うちらの配信見てんのかな？
subtitles.english: I wonder if Ohtora-san watches our streams?

subtitles.original: えー！
subtitles.english: Eh!

subtitles.original: 見てくれてるからこその、この解像度の作詞作曲なんじゃないの？
subtitles.english: Isn't that why the lyrics and composition have such high resolution?

subtitles.original: いや、確かに。これ見てなかったらなんか気まずいけどな
subtitles.english: Yeah, certainly. It'd be a bit awkward if they didn't watch it.

subtitles.original: その場合はカットで。生だけど。あ、生だから無理か
subtitles.english:
In that case, cut it. Even though it's live.
Ah, it's live so it's impossible.

subtitles.original: ということで、続きまして、7曲目もユニット曲でございます。
subtitles.english: So, moving on, the 7th song is also a unit song.

subtitles.original: 奏、はじめ二人の『LAKI MODE』の徹底解剖です！
subtitles.english: It's a thorough analysis of "LAKI MODE" by Kanade and Hajime!

subtitles.original: LAKI MODE! ヨオー！
subtitles.english: LAKI MODE! Yo-oh!

subtitles.original: え、LAKI MODE、どんな曲ですか？お二人どちらでもいいよ
subtitles.english: So, what kind of song is LAKI MODE? Either of you is fine.

subtitles.original: あ、LAKI MODEはですね。奏はこの曲は、
subtitles.english: Ah, LAKI MODE is... I thought this song is...

subtitles.original:
君と歌やダンスを通じて喜びや感情を分かち合おう、
るんるん、みたいな楽曲なのかなと思いました
subtitles.english:
...about sharing joy and emotions through singing and dancing with you,
like "run-run".

subtitles.original: あと楽曲の音的に、ReGLOSSの楽曲の中で一番キュートな曲かなと思ってて
subtitles.english: Also, sound-wise, I think it's the cutest song among ReGLOSS's songs.

subtitles.original:
そういうイメージがあって、奏の中でもこの曲を歌う時には、
とにかくキュートに歌おうっていう気持ちがあります
subtitles.english:
I have that image, so when I sing this song,
I have a feeling of singing it as cutely as possible.

subtitles.original:
あと、なんていうかこの楽曲、ラップみたく畳み掛けるような
ラップパートがすごく多いので...
subtitles.english:
Also, how should I say, this song has many rap parts
that follow one after another like rap...

subtitles.original:
噛まないようにってすごく気をつけて歌ってます。
よかったら聴いてください
subtitles.english:
I'm very careful not to stumble over my words while singing.
Please listen to it.

subtitles.original: 流しちゃおうかな、流す。いいよ
subtitles.english: Shall we play it? Let's play it. Go ahead.

subtitles.original: じゃ、流します。お願いします。噛まないように
subtitles.english: Then, I'll play it. Please listen. So I don't stumble...

subtitles.original: (LAKI MODE Snippet)
subtitles.english: (LAKI MODE Snippet)

subtitles.original: めちゃめちゃこの曲好きで
subtitles.english: I really like this song.

subtitles.original: わかる、いいよね。めっちゃ何回も聴いた
subtitles.english: I know, it's good. I listened to it many times.

subtitles.original:
これ、カラオケで歌ったんだけど、バカ難しくて、
絶対表じゃしばらく歌えません
subtitles.english:
I sang this at karaoke, but it was incredibly difficult,
I definitely can't sing it in public for a while.

subtitles.original: そうなの？えー、難しい
subtitles.english: Really? Eh, it's difficult.

subtitles.original: LAKI MODEはさ、なんか軽やかさがあるよね
subtitles.english: LAKI MODE has a certain lightness to it, doesn't it?

subtitles.original:
しかも、この二人の最高にいいところをこう抽出しました、
って感じで天才だと思った、マジで。溶け合うよね、二人の歌声が
subtitles.english:
And it feels like the best parts of these two were extracted,
I really thought it was genius. Their voices really melt together.

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます
subtitles.english: Thank you very much.

subtitles.original: あ、真ん中に入ってすみません。あー、いいぞ
subtitles.english: Ah, sorry for getting in the middle. Ah, this is good.

subtitles.original: はい、ということで、ここで秘蔵話いただいております
subtitles.english: Okay, so we have some behind-the-scenes stories here.

subtitles.original:
こちらは褒め言葉、かつ楽曲のポイントでございますね。
こちらです。じゃじゃーん
subtitles.english:
These are compliments and also key points of the song.
Here they are. Ta-da!

subtitles.original:
お二人の歌唱力が高いので、言葉は詰め込み過ぎず
歌唱力が伝わる楽曲に仕上げてます
subtitles.english:
Since both of them have high singing ability,
I finished the song so that their singing ability is conveyed without cramming in too many words.

subtitles.original: 素晴らしい。素晴らしい
subtitles.english: Wonderful. Wonderful.

subtitles.original: ちょ、確かに。嬉しいね
subtitles.english: Wait, certainly. I'm happy.
